alert.note: Alert for Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender (North Carolina) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wilmington (Northeastern South Carolina and Southeastern North Carolina - Wilmington)
info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued November 26 at 8:47PM EST until November 27 at 12:00PM EST by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO NOON EST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Up to one half foot of inundation above ground level expected in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways. * WHERE...Coastal Pender, Coastal New Hanover and Coastal Brunswick Counties. * WHEN...Within a 4 hour window centered around high tide, from 8 AM to noon EST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Low-lying roads and locations along the Intracoastal Waterway and adjacent tidal creeks may observe minor coastal flooding. Check with local officials for any road closures or impacts. Wave run-up may reach the base of the dune-line. Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Mercer Pier at Wrightsville Beach MLLW Categories - Minor 6.0 ft, Moderate 8.0 ft, Major 10.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.5 ft, Moderate 3.5 ft, Major 5.5 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 26/09 PM 4.7 0.2 0.8 2 None 27/10 AM 6.3 1.8 1.1 3-4 Minor 27/10 PM 3.5 -1.0 -0.3 4 None 28/11 AM 5.2 0.7 0.2 2-3 None 28/11 PM 4.2 -0.3 0.4 2 None 29/12 PM 5.4 0.9 0.6 2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property.

area.areaDesc: Coastal Brunswick; Coastal New Hanover; Coastal Pender
